General.Name: Metro Investment Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Metro Land Corporation Ltd. engages in the development of real estate properties in China. It develops residence, complex, business, villa, hotel, and regional development projects, as well as rail transit track base projects. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Beijing, China.

0.Name: Ms. Yi  Wei
0.Title: Chairman & Acting Sec. of the Board
